document_data.mainbody:
Protection from undead, 5 radius was an arcane abjuration and necromancy spell that protected the caster against one form of undead.
This spell created a globe of protection against a single form of undead. This sphere only protected against physical attacks from the undead. The spell could be centered on any touched target when cast.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required as a material component the dust from a destroyed undead creature of the type the caster wished to protect against to cast.
The entire structure of Tymoras Holy Hall of Good Fortune and Casino in Zhentil Keep was warded with a protection from undead spell.
